title: My Ex-Husband Is My Neighbor - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Divorce   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Second Chance
author: Lee Inhye   이인혜
description:
When I returned back time, it was ironically the day after our first night.

“Did you sleep well, Catherine?”

My husband’s voice, which I finally heard properly, was so sweet.

I just misunderstood and hated him because of his bad stepmother.

“I’m sorry to say this at this moment... but… we’re getting divorced, Hyugo.”

On her third day of marriage, Catherine was said that she divorced him.

***

Catherine was the last descendant of the ‘love clan’ who made true love happen.

After divorcing  her husband, she made a plan to collect the holy water of love by connecting the love of others. However…

“Long time no see, Catherine.”

“Hyu, Hyugo?”

“Now I should call you my neighbor, not my wife.”

Her ex-husband named Hyugo moved to Catherine’s next door, Being her neighbor?!>
